text: Walter Buchanan (1797 – 1877) was a British Whig and Liberal politician. Buchan was elected Whig MP for Glasgow at a by-election in 1857—caused by the resignation of John MacGregor—and, becoming a Liberal in 1859, held the seat until 1865 when he did not seek re-election. ==References== ==External links== * Category:UK MPs 1852–1857 Category:UK MPs 1857–1859 Category:UK MPs 1859–1865 Category:1797 births Category:1877 deaths Category:Whig (British political party) MPs for Scottish constituencies Category:Scottish Liberal Party MPs Category:Members of the Parliament of the United Kingdom for Glasgow constituencies
title: Walter Buchanan (MP)
